lessons.name: Week 3 Syllogistic Logic – Idiomatic Examples
lessons.description: Syllogistic logic studies arguments whose validity depends on “all,” “no,” some,” and similar notions. This set of exercises has you test validity by using the Star Test on idiomatic arguments written in English.

staticQuestions.question:
Is this valid?

Not all who are clean are generous. My reason for
saying this is that some who are frivolous are clean
and those who are generous are never frivolous.

Is this valid?

It is false that there are some gentle convicts who aren't
frightened. So everyone who is mean must be frightened, in view of
the fact that those who are mean are always gentle convicts.

Is this valid?

Since boastful criminals are tough and it's false
that some tough person is remarkable, as a result
no remarkable person is a boastful criminal.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a bitter druggist unless he or she is
faithful. Not all who are cheap are faithful. Then it
must be that some bitter druggists aren't cheap.

Is this valid?

The dullest cannibal is brilliant. We know this because
we know that whoever is a pal of Madonna isn't brilliant
and that the dullest cannibal isn't a pal of Madonna.

Is this valid?

No poor person is mediocre. For beautiful fugitives
are poor and it's false that there is some
beautiful fugitive who is mediocre.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a humorous bandit isn't cheap. But no one
is gloomy unless he or she is cheap. As a result,
not a single humorous bandit is gloomy.

Is this valid?

We may conclude that not all who are persistent are
grocers -- since grocers are cruel, and those
who are cruel aren't naive, and at least
some who are naive are persistent.

Is this valid?

You're the roughest person in Missouri and
the roughest person in Missouri doesn't appreciate
hypocrites. This implies that you must be sarcastic.
After all, whoever appreciates hypocrites isn't sarcastic.

Is this valid?

Jim isn't the wildest clown in Missouri. This
means that Jim can't be this terrified person, since
this terrified person is the wildest clown in Missouri.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a dentist in Missouri is short. Thus
one or more short persons are boring, since
surely some dentists in Missouri are boring.

Is this valid?

David isn't a cautious novelist. Of course the
brightest person is a cautious novelist. This
proves that David isn't the brightest person.

Is this valid?

No prosperous scientists are gentle. Not all people who
are prosperous scientists are tall. We may conclude that
people who are gentle are sometimes tall.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a courteous politician unless he or she
is realistic. Not all who are mean are realistic.
Hence some who are mean aren't courteous politicians.

Is this valid?

You aren't famous -- because you're the
toughest person in Missouri and the toughest
person in Missouri knows republicans. Naturally
those who know republicans aren't famous.

Is this valid?

Because the cruelest person is a bitter doctor, it
must be that Keith is the cruelest person -- since
Keith is a bitter doctor.

Is this valid?

Tom can't be forgetful. I say this for three
reasons. (1) Tom is a pickpocket. (2) No pickpockets
are rich. And finally (3) none but rich
people are forgetful.

Is this valid?

No frantic bankers are candid. People who are
tough are sometimes candid. This shows that not
everyone who is tough is a frantic banker.

Is this valid?

Jim is a friendly wrestler. How do I know
this? Well, Jim is strong and only
those who are strong are friendly wrestlers.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a disgusting professor isn't short. But no one
is short unless he or she is comical. As a result,
not a single disgusting professor is comical.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a carpenter unless he or she is poetic. It
follows that only those who are carpenters are poetic.

Is this valid?

Not all who are romantic are slow. My reason for
saying this is that some who are nervous are slow
and those who are romantic are never nervous.

Is this valid?

One or more terrified dentists aren't bashful. This proves
that not all who are bashful are terrified dentists.

Is this valid?

Any talented druggist is boring. Not everyone
who is wild is a talented druggist. Hence
not everyone who is wild is boring.

Is this valid?

At least some backpackers in Missouri are mean. Thus
some backpackers in Missouri are frivolous, since surely
some mean persons are frivolous.

Is this valid?

At least one poet is remarkable, and only
those who are tough are poets. It follows
that some remarkable persons are tough.

Is this valid?

Madonna isn't a dishonest fugitive. And
dishonest fugitives aren't slow. All this
implies that Madonna is notorious -- since we
all know that slow people are notorious.

Is this valid?

Not all who are short are greedy. My reason for
saying this is that some who are courageous are short
and those who are greedy are never courageous.

Is this valid?

At least one smart person is candid, and only
those who are smart are bandits. It follows
that some who are candid are bandits.

Is this valid?

Carol is a beautiful grocer. This means that
Carol is weak -- since only those
who are weak are beautiful grocers.

Is this valid?

One or more guitarists in Missouri must be mediocre. The evidence
for this is that whoever is a guitarist in Missouri is wild
and that some who are wild are mediocre.

Is this valid?

It's false that disgusting persons are sometimes hypocrites. This
follows from the fact that not a single hypocrite is disgusting.

Is this valid?

Since naive clowns are slow and it's false
that some slow person is dangerous, as a result
no dangerous person is a naive clown.

Is this valid?

Since one or more polite judges are demented, I conclude
that at least one demented person is a polite judge.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a tactful musician unless he or she is
virtuous. Not all who are rough are virtuous. Then it
must be that some tactful musicians aren't rough.

Is this valid?

We may conclude that not all who are vicious are
pessimists -- since pessimists are slow, and those
who are slow aren't talented, and at least
some who are talented are vicious.

Is this valid?

You're the wildest person in Missouri and
the wildest person in Missouri doesn't despise
reporters. This implies that you must be gentle.
After all, whoever despises reporters isn't gentle.

Is this valid?

The boldest politician is courteous. We know this because
we know that whoever is a neighbor of Donna isn't courteous
and that the boldest politician isn't a neighbor of Donna.

Is this valid?

It is false that there is some notorious republican who isn't
creative. Therefore everyone who is weak is creative,
since people who are notorious republicans are always weak.

Is this valid?

Pals of Harry aren't bitter. The cruelest doctor
is a pal of Harry. From this it follows that the
cruelest doctor isn't bitter.

Is this valid?

Some who are hideous aren't mean. So
those who are candid are sometimes mean. I
assume that no one who is candid is also hideous.

Is this valid?

No bold person is gloomy. For frantic wrestlers
are bold and it's false that there is some
frantic wrestler who is gloomy.

Is this valid?

You aren't humorous -- because you're the
weakest person in Missouri and the weakest
person in Missouri encourages professors. Naturally
those who encourage professors aren't humorous.

Is this valid?

Sally can't be nervous. I say this for three
reasons. (1) Sally is a biologist. (2) No biologists
are clean. And finally (3) none but clean
people are nervous.

Is this valid?

Because the richest person is a polite carpenter, it
must be that George is the richest person -- since
George is a polite carpenter.

Is this valid?

No boring convicts are virtuous. People who are
tough are sometimes virtuous. This shows that not
everyone who is tough is a boring convict.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a diabetic unless he or she is frightened. It
follows that only those who are diabetics are frightened.

Is this valid?

George isn't a cheerful druggist. Of course the
richest person is a cheerful druggist. This
proves that George isn't the richest person.

Is this valid?

No cowardly poets are remarkable. Not all people who
are cowardly poets are smart. We may conclude that
people who are remarkable are sometimes smart.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a fugitive in Missouri is clean. Thus
one or more clean persons are bitter, since
surely some fugitives in Missouri are bitter.

Is this valid?

At least some grocers in Missouri aren't cheap. Thus not
all grocers in Missouri are beautiful, since surely those who
are cheap are sometimes not beautiful.

Is this valid?

Any colorful hypocrite is mediocre. Not everyone
who is tall is a colorful hypocrite. Hence
not everyone who is tall is mediocre.

Is this valid?

At least one clown is naive, and only
those who are mean are clowns. It follows
that some naive persons are mean.

Is this valid?

Tom is a persistent dentist. This means that
Tom is bold -- since only those
who are bold are persistent dentists.

Is this valid?

One or more musicians in Missouri must be demented. The evidence
for this is that whoever is a musician in Missouri is cheap
and that some who are cheap are demented.

Is this valid?

Since bashful scientists are cruel and it's false
that some cruel person is talented, as a result
no talented person is a bashful scientist.

Is this valid?

Carol isn't a vicious politician. And
vicious politicians aren't rich. All this
implies that Carol is frivolous -- since we
all know that rich people are frivolous.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a realistic senator isn't tough. But no one
is frightened unless he or she is tough. As a result,
not a single realistic senator is frightened.

Is this valid?

Not all who are dull are remarkable. My reason for
saying this is that some who are cheerful are dull
and those who are remarkable are never cheerful.

Is this valid?

It's false that dishonest persons are sometimes students. This
follows from the fact that not a single student is dishonest.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a famous banker unless he or she is
notorious. Not all who are dull are notorious. Then it
must be that some famous bankers aren't dull.

Is this valid?

It is false that there are some confused wrestlers who aren't
fanatical. So everyone who is bold must be fanatical, in view of
the fact that those who are bold are always confused wrestlers.

Is this valid?

You're the cheapest person in Missouri and
the cheapest person in Missouri doesn't bribe
Germans. This implies that you must be forgetful.
After all, whoever bribes Germans isn't forgetful.

Is this valid?

Sally is this confident person. This follows because
Sally is the meanest terrorist in Missouri and this
confident person is the meanest terrorist in Missouri.

Is this valid?

The boldest convict is gloomy. We know this because
we know that whoever is a parent of Jim isn't gloomy
and that the boldest convict isn't a parent of Jim.

Is this valid?

You aren't miserable -- because you're the
slowest person in Missouri and the slowest
person in Missouri forgets dentists. Naturally
those who forget dentists aren't miserable.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a poetic foreigner unless he or she
is disgusting. Not all who are clean are disgusting.
Hence some who are clean aren't poetic foreigners.

Is this valid?

Since one or more persistent diabetics are curious, I conclude
that at least one curious person is a persistent diabetic.

Is this valid?

At least some backpackers in Missouri are slow. Thus
some backpackers in Missouri are terrified, since surely
some slow persons are terrified.

Is this valid?

Not all who are frivolous are dull. My reason for
saying this is that some who are talented are dull
and those who are frivolous are never talented.

Is this valid?

Because the richest person is a frightened poet, it
must be that Tom is the richest person -- since
Tom is a frightened poet.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a bandit unless he or she is powerful. It
follows that only those who are bandits are powerful.

Is this valid?

No famous customers are dishonest. Not all people who
are famous customers are wild. We may conclude that
people who are dishonest are sometimes wild.

Is this valid?

Defenders of Keith aren't hideous. The meanest guitarist
is a defender of Keith. From this it follows that the
meanest guitarist isn't hideous.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a brilliant clown isn't smart. But no one
is smart unless he or she is forgetful. As a result,
not a single brilliant clown is forgetful.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a pilot in Missouri is strong. Thus
one or more strong persons are mediocre, since
surely some pilots in Missouri are mediocre.

Is this valid?

Donna can't be humorous. I say this for three
reasons. (1) Donna is a judge. (2) No judges
are cruel. And finally (3) none but cruel
people are humorous.

Is this valid?

It is false that there is some persistent dentist who isn't
naive. Therefore everyone who is rich is naive,
since people who are persistent dentists are always rich.

Is this valid?

Harry isn't a romantic prisoner. Of course the
slowest person is a romantic prisoner. This
proves that Harry isn't the slowest person.

Is this valid?

One or more virtuous musicians aren't tactful. This proves
that not all who are tactful are virtuous musicians.

Is this valid?

Any charitable pessimist is talented. Not everyone
who is rich is a charitable pessimist. Hence
not everyone who is rich is talented.

Is this valid?

No slow person is gentle. For charming politicians
are slow and it's false that there is some
charming politician who is gentle.

Is this valid?

At least some Canadians in Missouri aren't wild. Thus not
all Canadians in Missouri are remarkable, since surely those who
are wild are sometimes not remarkable.

Is this valid?

Some who are cowardly aren't rich. So
those who are faithful are sometimes rich. I
assume that no one who is faithful is also cowardly.

Is this valid?

At least one banker is courageous, and only
those who are slow are bankers. It follows
that some courageous persons are slow.

Is this valid?

At least one clean person is greedy, and only
those who are clean are democrats. It follows
that some who are greedy are democrats.

Is this valid?

Donna is a forgetful wrestler. This means that
Donna is cruel -- since only those
who are cruel are forgetful wrestlers.

Is this valid?

Whoever is a colorful German isn't bold. But no one
is mediocre unless he or she is bold. As a result,
not a single colorful German is mediocre.

Is this valid?

It is false that there are some poetic convicts who aren't
naive. So everyone who is wild must be naive, in view of
the fact that those who are wild are always poetic convicts.

Is this valid?

Jim is a nervous soldier. How do I know
this? Well, Jim is poor and only
those who are poor are nervous soldiers.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a sarcastic dentist unless he or she is
romantic. Not all who are tough are romantic. Then it
must be that some sarcastic dentists aren't tough.

Is this valid?

No virtuous druggists are terrified. People who are
cheap are sometimes terrified. This shows that not
everyone who is cheap is a virtuous druggist.

Is this valid?

Not all who are cruel are scholarly. My reason for
saying this is that some who are boring are cruel
and those who are scholarly are never boring.

Is this valid?

One or more fugitives in Missouri must be charitable. The evidence
for this is that whoever is a fugitive in Missouri is rich
and that some who are rich are charitable.

Is this valid?

You aren't gentle -- because you're the
smartest person in Missouri and the smartest
person in Missouri respects plumbers. Naturally
those who respect plumbers aren't gentle.

Is this valid?

Because the dullest person is a cheerful bandit, it
must be that Harry is the dullest person -- since
Harry is a cheerful bandit.

Is this valid?

A person isn't a creative guitarist unless he or she
is remarkable. Not all who are smart are remarkable.
Hence some who are smart aren't creative guitarists.

Is this valid?

We may conclude that not all who are bitter are
clowns -- since clowns are dull, and those
who are dull aren't faithful, and at least
some who are faithful are bitter.

Is this valid?

Since candid dentists are bright and it's false
that some bright person is selfish, as a result
no selfish person is a candid dentist.

Is this valid?

It's false that humorous persons are sometimes prisoners. This
follows from the fact that not a single prisoner is humorous.
